bug.author: htdt
bug.description: The environment zip <denchmark-link:https://storage.googleapis.com/obstacle-tower-build/v2.0/obstacletower_v2.0_linux.zip>https://storage.googleapis.com/obstacle-tower-build/v2.0/obstacletower_v2.0_linux.zip</denchmark-link> contains extra empty folder

comments.comment: It's because the environment is built in macOS of Unity, the macOS will add that folder in zip file, just ignore it.

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/htdt>@htdt</denchmark-link>
Thanks for pointing this out. As <denchmark-link:https://github.com/karta1297963>@karta1297963</denchmark-link> says, it does not impact the use of the binary, but it also should not be there. We will make a note to remove it soon.
Hi all, I've just fixed this issue. The builds online no longer contain the added mac hidden files.
